message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Could I obtain monthly data from January 2025 to May 2025 (including January 2025 and May 2025) for NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai Stock Exchange, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, and Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing?

 Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following column names in order: Exchange Name, Statistical Month, Total Trading Value (USD millions), Total Number of Listed Companies, Domestic Market Capitalization (USD millions), Index Levels
For the statistical month, keep the format as January 2025. 
For total trading value and domestic market capitalization, both of the terms refer to equity.
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

To address this query, I need to gather specific details about monthly data availability for multiple stock exchanges including NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai Stock Exchange, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, and Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing. 

<search>Monthly data availability for NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai Stock Exchange, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, and Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing</search>

Search query: Monthly data availability for NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai Stock Exchange, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, and Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing

Monthly Statistics - HKEX Monthly Statistics · Futures and Options · Hang Seng Index Futures · Mini Hang Seng Index Futures · HSI (Gross Total Return Index) Futures · HSI (Net Total Return ...

Asian End of Day Pricing - Financial, Economic and Alternative Data The Asian End-of-Day Pricing data feed provides daily, ready to use, adjusted closing prices and adjustment factors for major exchanges in China, Hong Kong, ...

[Doc 3](https://www.hkex.com.hk/Mutual-Market/Stock-Connect/Statistics/Historical-Monthly?sc_lang=en):
Historical Monthly - HKEX Monthly statistics on Northbound and Southbound fund flows through Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Connect.

Based on the above findings:

<search>Monthly trading data NASDAQ NYSE</search>

Search query: Monthly trading data NASDAQ NYSE
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.nasdaqtrader.com/trader.aspx?id=monthlymarketsummary):
Monthly Market Summary - Nasdaq Trader The Monthly Market Summary provides a summarization of activity for a given month. The values are an aggregation of the month's trading statistics.

Volume Statistics | Nasdaq, Inc. - Investor Relations Volume Statistics: Quarterly Results, Income Statement, Trend Summary and GAAP to Non-GAAP Reconciliation, Annual Reports, SEC Filings.

NASDAQ Composite (^IXIC) Historical Data - Yahoo Finance Get historical data for the NASDAQ Composite (^IXIC) on Yahoo Finance. View and download daily, weekly or monthly data to help your investment decisions.
